attributes.action: Allow school students to express themselves through appearance
attributes.additional_details: Schools should not limit their students expression of themselves. To say it is distracting is both unfair and incorrect. It will not impact their learning and helps them discover their identity. Almost all students would much rather be able to express themselves through physical appearance, and limiting that leads students to be monotonous and not unique, forcing them to live without expressing who they truly are.
attributes.background:
Remove all school rules about physical appearance (except for uniform) 
dyed hair, piercings, makeup, nails, rolled skirt etc.

rejection.details: These things are a matter for individual school governorship which the Government has made clear recently in statements about its national guidance on school uniforms
